Uses of Interface
org.apache.lucene.spatial3d.geom.Bounds

  • Packages that use Bounds 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.spatial3d.geom
    Shapes implemented using 3D planar geometry.

    • Uses of Bounds in org.apache.lucene.spatial3d.geom

      Classes in org.apache.lucene.spatial3d.geom that implement Bounds 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LatLonBounds
      An object for accumulating latitude/longitude bounds information.
      class  XYZBounds
      An object for accumulating XYZ bounds information.
